methodsummary

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • methodsummary.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that can parse java source files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser()
      A constructor to generate a method summary if there is no parent files of the java source that we are parsing
      Parser(java.lang.String root)
      A constructor to initialize the tools for parser such as assigning root node for java sources and listing the sub files for parsing to the methods to generate method summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addJavaFilesandMethods()
      A method to add java files to the root node for parsing their methods in it
      void addNode(java.io.File file)
      This method adds a java file into the method summary
      void addPackage(java.io.File packageFile, java.lang.String title)
      A method to add package file under the root file and set the name of the file as a title of the project
      void clearNodes()
      This method clears the tree
      boolean contains(java.io.File file)
      A method to check whether the given file from parameter is in it the method summary
      javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getRootNode()
      A method to get root node
      boolean hasMain(java.io.File file)
      A method to check whether the file has a main method in it or not
      void refreshNode(java.io.File file)
      A method to refresh the method summary if there is any change in the java source file
      void removeNode(java.io.File file)
      A method to remove the given file, which is given from parameter, from method summary nodes
      java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> searchMain(java.io.File srcDir)
      A method to search the main method in the list of files and return the list of files which have main methods in it

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • refreshNode

                 throws com.github.javaparser.ParseException,
                        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        file - a parameter to take a file to parse for refreshing its nodes

        com.github.javaparser.ParseException
        java.io.IOException

      • hasMain

        public boolean hasMain(java.io.File file)
        A method to check whether the file has a main method in it or not
        Parameters:
        file - a parameter to take the file to check
        Returns:
        true if the file has a main method; false, if it hasn't

      • searchMain

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> searchMain(java.io.File srcDir)
        A method to search the main method in the list of files and return the list of files which have main methods in it
        Parameters:
        srcDir - a parameter to take the file which has files in it to search main methods
        Returns:
        list of files which have main methods in it in the ArrayList type

      • addPackage

        public void addPackage(java.io.File packageFile,
                       java.lang.String title)
                throws com.github.javaparser.ParseException,
                       java.io.IOException
        A method to add package file under the root file and set the name of the file as a title of the project
        Parameters:
        packageFile - a parameter to take the file as a src file of the source files in File type
